dc:title: Day After Day - May 1937
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes the agrarian life at the Easton, Pennsylvania, farm--plans for the barns, a newborn lamb, and the promise of goats. Tells of stopping in Grand Rapids, Michigan, on her way West.
